TaskRef get_task_hierarchy ( taskspec_t *  task_specification  ) 

A particular instance of FittedRmaxq should implement this function, which constructs the task hierarchy that FittedRmaxq should use.

Definition at line 14 of file FittedRmax-FPWorld.cc.

const double epsilon = 0.01 [static]

Terminal Bellman residual threshold for value iteration.

Planning terminates after each time step when the largest value change is smaller than this threshold.

Definition at line 43 of file FittedRmax-FPWorld.cc.

Referenced by get_task_hierarchy().

const double minweight = 0.01 [static]

Threshold for the weight of a transition used to approximate an action's model, as a fraction of the maximum possible weight of a transition.

Combined with modelbreadth, determines the maximum distance over which generalization can occur. Setting this number to 1.0 would remove all generalization.

Definition at line 38 of file FittedRmax-FPWorld.cc.

Referenced by get_task_hierarchy().

const double modelbreadth = 0.04 [static]

Degree of generalization used to estimate the model for each action.

A Gaussian kernel with this standard deviation (in the scaled state space) weights the contribution of nearby states to the model for a given action at a given state.

Definition at line 25 of file FittedRmax-FPWorld.cc.

Referenced by get_task_hierarchy().

const int resolutionfactor = 4 [static]

Controls the resolution of the evenly spaced grid used to approximate the value function.

For each unit distance in the scaled state space, the grid will have 2^(resolutionfactor) points.

Definition at line 31 of file FittedRmax-FPWorld.cc.
